```{python, eval=TRUE, results="asis", echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
target = [

  , "ntEvenS1"
  , "ntIntS1"
  , "ntIrrS1"
  , "ntNatS1"

  , "ntRatS1"

]

```

```{python, eval=TRUE, results="asis", echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}

    print(CTNS(
        target = [ p ], 
        image_target = p,
        #write_file = False,
```
